Literature.Title: Analogues of a Cyclic Antimicrobial Peptide with a Flexible Linker Show Promising Activity against Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Thomsen TT, Mendel HC, Al-Mansour W, Oddo A, Løbner-Olesen A, Hansen PR

Literature.Title: Novel Cyclic Lipopeptide Antibiotics: Effects of Acyl Chain Length and Position.
Literature.Author: Jensen SK, Thomsen TT, Oddo A, Franzyk H, Løbner-Olesen A, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:36% Hemolysis=150 µM,Human erythrocytes:77% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>64µg/ml)
